headline.main: Facebook Acquires Israeli Facial Recognition Company

docs.snippet: Buying an individual company’s stock is a wager on an unknowable future, as Facebook investors will tell you, and it can take decades before you know if you have a winner....
docs.lead_paragraph: Buying an individual company’s stock is a wager on an unknowable future, as Facebook investors will tell you, and it can take decades before you know if you have a winner.
docs.abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column contends that Facebook's unruly initial public offering, and the subsequent decline in its stock price, underlines how difficult it is for individual investors to profitably pick stocks; argues that in most cases it can take decades of sustained investment in single entities before such bets pay off.

headline.seo: How to Pick Stocks After Facebook’s I.P.O.

headline.main: Facebook on Track for I.P.O. Roadshow

docs.snippet: The gray area of comedy podcasts analyzed by a longtime fan of stand-up,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The abundance of podcasts hosted by professional comedians has liberated these entertainers from the expectation of always having to be "on" publicly. To a longtime fan of stand-up, these podcasts instantly sounded odd to me, because they seemed to exist in the gray area between the comedian being "on" and "off."
docs.abstract: The gray area of comedy podcasts analyzed by a longtime fan of stand-up,
